content: this basic hat pattern is the perfect beginner s first hat it is very quick to make and is perfect for a last minute gift or for charity hook- size i/9- 5 50 mm or size h/8 5 00 mm for toddler/child size beanie yarn- red heart soft caron simply soft or any soft worsted weight yarn 1 skein is enough for 2-4 hats depending on size or size of skein note if the diameter is not what it should be at the points noted below you might be crocheting too tight and may need to loosen up or use a larger hook until you achieve the diameter sizes listed below do not change hook during project just start over using a bigger hook if needed gauge- 1st 2 rnds = 2 5 in diameter all sizes included
